treatment-md.title: Myrsidea rubica Kounek, Sychra, Capek, Lipkova & Literak, 2011, sp. nov.
treatment-md.article-title: Chewing lice of the genus Myrsidea (Phthiraptera: Menoponidae) from the Cardinalidae, Emberizidae, Fringillidae and Thraupidae (Aves: Passeriformes) from Costa Rica, with descriptions of four new species
